```{r}
suits <- function(x){
  x%%10
}

rank <- function(x){
  x%/%10
}

is_royal_flush<- function(hand){
  all(rank(hand) == 13:9) && all(suits(hand)==suits(hand)[1])
}

is_straight_flush<- function(hand){
    all((sort(rank(hand))-sort(rank(hand))[1]) == 0:4) && all(rank(hand) != 13:9) && all(suits(hand)==suits(hand)[1]) 
}
```
